subject: [PATCH v2] smaps: Report correct page sizes with THP

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Raised the issue of MMUPageSize field presence in smaps output for VMAs without resident pages, suggesting a potential fix to always add it.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: Usama Arif questions whether the MMUPageSize field should always be present in smaps output, even for VMAs without resident pages.
